properties.name: gcc.databases
properties.description: Bancos de dados separados por virgula

properties.name: gcc.pool.initial-size
properties.description: Set the number of connections that will be established when the connection pool is started

properties.name: gcc.pool.max-idle
properties.description: The maximum number of connections that should be kept in the idle pool if isPoolSweeperEnabled() returns false

properties.name: gcc.pool.max-active
properties.description: The maximum number of active connections that can be allocated from this pool at the same time

properties.name: gcc.entities
properties.description: Pacotes de entidades para ser escaneado pelo entity manager separados por vírgula
